train.input: Grandpa enjoys reading mystery novels indoors.
She traveled across western Europe last summer.
Kevin inherited old coins from his grandfather.
The children played soccer until sunset.
The chef added extra spices to the soup.
The dog chased friendly puppies at the park.
Daniel offered unusual solutions during the meeting.
Alice reads interesting books every month.

test.input: The students assembled enormous projects for the science fair.
Emily brought thick blankets to the picnic.

My friends enjoyed outdoor activities all weekend.
